sense.gloss: the Snake (sixth sign of the Chinese zodiac), the Serpent
hour of the Snake (around 10am, 9-11am, or 10am-12 noon)
fourth month of the lunar calendar

meanings: sign of the snake or serpent

sdata.j: ↑克|巳|↑↓かつみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑思↑↓おも↓い↑通↑↓どお↓りにするのが↑許↑↓ゆる↓されないと、すぐ↑腹↑↓はら↓をたてる。
sdata.e: If Katsumi is not allowed to have his own way, he easily gets angry.

sdata.j: ↑克|巳|↑↓かつみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑思↑↓おも↓い↑通↑↓どお↓りにするのが↑許↑↓ゆる↓されないと、すぐ↑腹↑↓はら↓をたてる。
sdata.e: If Katsumi doesn't get his own way, he gets angry right away.

sdata.j: 「トムとジョンって↑一卵性双生児↑↓いちらんせいそうせいじ↓とは↑聞↑↓き↓いてたけど、↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓によく↑似↑↓に↓てるよね？」「↑似↑↓に↓てる↑似↑↓に↓てる。↑親↑↓おや↓にも↑時々↑↓ときどき↓↑間違↑↓まちが↓えられるって↑言↑↓い↓ってたよ。あの↑二人↑↓ふたり↓はほんと、↑已↑↓い↓↑己|↑↓こ↓↑巳|↑↓み↓↑己↑↓き↓だよ」
sdata.e: I heard that Tom and John are identical twins. They really do look alike, don't they? "Yes, they really do look very similar. Even their parents say they get confused sometimes. Those two really are very similar, aren't they?"
